name: PulseDrive
description:
PulseDrive is a retro-inspired rhythm game where you play as a ship that collects pulse and rewind batteries to charge their pulse drive, which allows them to rewind time.

Fly through colorful galaxies and dark planets while defying the laws of space and time!

Note: Web build does not contain rewinding music.

Basics:

  • Click to move
  • Gather batteries to gain points
  • Your movements are recorded
  • Once the timer reaches 0, your movements are reversed and you can collect green (rewind) batteries.
  • Each song is split into 2 regular phases and 2 rewind phases
  • Challenge your friends to see who can get a higher score!
